author: jim hayward
comment: This is a really nice clean face design. I'd love it if the Dev would add some further complications. Maybe external app options to show at the top and bottom in the same style as the date and battery. Personally I'd like to have my polar flow exercise progress on there. Otherwise I love it, great looking clean face

author: Drew Patton
comment: It's pretty good

author: Jay Ballard
comment: Almost perfect.  When you swipe up and the notifications on the watch show the dots shrink but in a circle above the notification.  I wish all the colors acted the same as the black watch face. Where it looks seamless. Other than that amazing work!
title: Great watchface

author: Artur Janazyan
comment: But I would like to have one more thing - the day of weeks and it would be excellent
title: Very nice

author: Thomas Parker
comment: Is it possible to switch the date with the battery?   The date is always on the right side of every watch,  except for this watch face.   Thanks!!!!!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Yeah, actually I should have done it, will be there with the next update! Thanks, Maciej

title: Great watch face

author: Curtis Ferguson
comment: Would LOVE if you could remove the leadoff zero.

author: Eloise Trosan
comment: Beautiful design with nice details! Love it!
title: Lovely!

author: Christian Wiström
comment: Looks great. Love the minimalistic design. Have an LG g, if I could wish I would like the numbers to be bigger, possibility to add date if wanted and to manage settings from the phone.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Date dot and phone settings are implemented in today's update, hope you'll like it :) more customization soon!

title: Looking great!

author: Boe Ziffer
comment: I Love this watch face, but please add the date. I find i don't use it as much as other faces because of this one limitation. :(

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: In 3.0 update that is already in the Play Store, you get new dot with number representing day of month. Thank you for your feedback!

title: Needs Date

author: Miles Lynn
comment: Very nice watch face but it drains the 360 at an unbelievable rate.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: 3.0 update has a battery saving mode, hope you'll check it out :)

title: Battery drain

author: Brandon Johnson
comment: The only thing it needs now is to display phone battery status

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Long press the watch face, tap the gear icon below the thubmnail on faces list and then you can customize it. If you need any help, please contact me via email: contact@atektura.watch

title: I like it

author: Gary Santiago
comment: I cannot see the setting on phone

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Dots doesn't have it yet. Phone settings will be available in 3.0. EDIT: It was a while since my reply, but 3.0 update is already ready to download, including phone settings and more!

title: Apps not showing on phone

author: Divy Tolia
comment: Its great but drains my battery crazy fast I think it's a bug please fix it

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Now with 3.0 update you have a battery-saving option to choose tick or smooth seconds dot animation. It should be helpful :)

title: Great only one issue

author: Brian Buquoi
comment: Had some issues early on, the developer reached out promptly and had the issues resolved in a very timely manner!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi, more details on this would be appreciated. Please, if possible, send more feedback to kontakt@atektura.pl. Thank you.

author: Andrew Hoang
comment: Would love option for date.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Long time no see, but now with 3.0 update you finally have an additional date dot :)

title: Stylish, easy to read.

author: Louis Hill
comment: Nice and simple. But needs the date. A feature I use daily. Something small and out the way

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: "Day of month" dot just added in latest 3.0 update :)

title: Just needs the date

author: Andrew Jones
comment: I like the idea. I would like customization from androidware and not just the watch

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: It's coming in the next update :) EDIT: the update is F-I-N-A-L-L-Y here ;) I know it was a while, but hope you'll like it anyway :)

title: Settings

author: Gary Thomas
comment: This has become one of my favorite watch faces.
title: Awesome!

author: HumVegan Chick
comment: The app doesn't show up on my moto 360. Please help.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, please make sure your watch's battery status isn't low. You may also need to force-sync your moto with a smartphone via Android Wear app. If you still have a problem, email me: kontakt@atektura.pl

author: Michelle Dewis
comment: Looks great and animations are nice and smooth. Excellent developer support.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi, with 2.1 update (already uploaded, available soon) you get that square screen redesign. Hope you enjoy it. Thanks for your feedback!

title: Pretty

author: Nathan McLennan
comment: Quick response and fix from developer. Great watchface.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. It looks like an issue with square devices. Fix will be available as soon as possible.

title: Excellent.

author: Kanonno Earhart
comment: Colorful Dots 😊!
title: Simple √ beauty √ And more...

author: Elden Lashley
comment: Looks great on my 360
title: Love it

author: Will Bresnahan
comment: Awesome watch face.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hi. Settings are available on the smartwatch only right now (smartphone-side app will be available soon). Please long-press a watch face, and tap a "gear" icon below a thumbnail on the faces list. There you can customize it. Hope it helps. Enjoy!

title: Great

author: Tyler Hilliard
comment: One of the best around!

author: IRONWILL989
comment: Groovy, clean, savory as bacon

author: Tyler
comment: Really love the face, however would love 12hr format for those of us over here in the states, as well as different color options. I know developer is working on these two things so that's why I say 5 stars     Edit, already added it, thanks!

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Those options are already available in your version (2.0), but only on a watch. Long-press on a watchface and tap gear icon below to change time format and skins :) hope it helps.

title: Great design.

author: Dinico Win
comment: Those animations
title: Beautiful

author: Ben Mounsey
comment: ...Really good that the developer is listening to customers, great watch face, grateful for the quick updates. Could be better with improvements to make the seconds ticker smoother. Colour schemes are welcome, but needs some refinement, would be nicer to just have different color options on the dial, rather than the background and this added outer-ring , current color options detract from the lovely design of the original. Just my opinion :-)

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content:
I'm working on it at the moment (on both cases). The update will be available until next week :)
EDIT:
2.0 update is already uploaded! It should be available for download in 3-4 hours :)

title: Great...

author: frankie cortina
comment: I NEED a 12 hour format watch face. Military time is not practical for me and I really need a 12 hour option. Design is beautiful though so ile keep it but I won't use it until I get my 12 hour

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content:
An update including this feature is coming this week :) Thanks
EDIT:
2.0 update is already uploaded! It should be available for download in 3-4 hours :)

title: Love the watch face but..

author: Dan Aston
comment: Nice watch face, looks great. I look forward to seeing some customizations like adding date, battery percent or maybe changing colors/background.

reply.author: ATEKTURA/
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your feedback. In few latest updates you get more options to customize the watch face. With upcoming 2.1 version you also get an additional battery dot :) Hope you enjoy it, thanks!

title: Not bad...

comment: A very nice watch face that takes good advantage of both digital and  analogue presentation.
